Our client, in downtown Chicago, is looking for a Lead Manager of Data Science to join their growing team. This Lead of Data Science will work with advanced analytics to solve customer acquisition business problems along with work with stakeholder to communicate insights from the data. This is a great hands-on Data Science role with great benefits! Base pay can range from 160- 210K depending on level plus bonus.Let's talk if you have:• PhD (preferred) in Computer Science, Physics (or related quant field)• Expertise in Python• Customer Analytics• Natural Language Processing , Customer Analytics• Data Science experience/research with building recommender systems Keywords – Python, Natural Language Processing, PhD, Data Science, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science,
